inclusion.criterion: All case report forms (CRF) will be kept for the analysis in Feiring Heart Clinic before their introduction to the database electronically.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: All CRF's are checked centrally for validity and completeness.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All information obtained as a result of the study will be regarded confidential until appropriate analysis and review is performed.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The results will be published and presented internationally.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: As far authorship and contribution, the investigators will follow the recommendations from the International Committee of Medical Journal Editor (ICMJE)(www.ICMJE.org).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: After publication of the initial report, participating investigators may prepare and publish sub analysis.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All sub studies must be approved by the steering committee.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All participant investigators will be acknowledged by name in the main publication.The recommendations of the STROBE group will be followed all the way (7).
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Previous cardiovascular disease (CHD ; peripherical atherosclerosis, deep venous thrombosis /pulmonary embolism, congenital heart disease, presence of valvular heart disease).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Lung disease restricting usual physical activity .
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Serious psychological problems (that hinders the participation in the study)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: All kind of disease restricting performing adequate physical activity .
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of cancer shortening drastically survival.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes and cardiomyopathy, but no previous cardiovascular disease or lung disease. He is insured according to Norwegian regulations.
